# The `PredicatedScalarEvolution` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An interface layer with <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> used to manage how we see <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expressions for values in the context of existing predicates. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

An interface layer with <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> used to manage how we see <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expressions for values in the context of existing predicates.

We can add new predicates, but we cannot remove them.

This layer has multiple purposes:
<ul>
<li>provides a simple interface for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> versioning.</li>
<li>guarantees that the order of transformations applied on a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expression for a single <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> is consistent across two different getSCEV calls. This means that, for example, once we&#39;ve obtained an AddRec expression for a certain value through expression rewriting, we will continue to get an AddRec expression for that <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>.</li>
<li>lowers the number of expression rewrites.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line 2383 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h">ScalarEvolution.h</a>.

### getAsAddRec() {#aa364810e8fe30937277d9dd8a301c4c9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const SCEVAddRecExpr &#42; PredicatedScalarEvolution::getAsAddRec (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; V)</>}>
Attempts to produce an AddRecExpr for V by adding additional <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> predicates.

If we can&#39;t transform the expression into an AddRecExpr we return nullptr and not add additional <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> predicates to the current context.

### getSCEV() {#ae0994d8207b94ad22ecebc1a6bc580f1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const SCEV &#42; PredicatedScalarEvolution::getSCEV (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; V)</>}>
Returns the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expression of V, in the context of the current <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> predicate.

The order of transformations applied on the expression of V returned by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> is guaranteed to be preserved, even when adding new predicates.

### getSmallConstantMaxTripCount() {#aacf376f9963d73732052a7362c5afabd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned PredicatedScalarEvolution::getSmallConstantMaxTripCount ()">
Returns the upper bound of the loop trip count as a normal unsigned value, or 0 if the trip count is unknown.

### Generation {#a9c19ab07280d9152155dbf96e2a840f0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::PredicatedScalarEvolution::Generation = 0">
Marks the version of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> predicate used.

When rewriting a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expression we mark it with the version of the predicate. We use this to figure out if the predicate has changed from the last rewrite of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a>. If so, we need to perform a new rewrite.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h/#l02469">2469</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h">ScalarEvolution.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  prototype={<>std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;SCEVUnionPredicate&gt; llvm::PredicatedScalarEvolution::Preds</>}>

We will rewrite all expressions assuming that this predicate true.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h/#l02463">2463</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h">ScalarEvolution.h</a>.

### RewriteMap {#aca7f54a2245a31bbd96e21aa2e3bb092}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DenseMap&lt;const SCEV &#42;, RewriteEntry&gt; llvm::PredicatedScalarEvolution::RewriteMap</>}>
Maps a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> to the rewrite result of that <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> at a certain version number.

If this number doesn&#39;t match the current Generation, we will need to do a rewrite. To preserve the transformation order of previous rewrites, we will rewrite the previous result instead of the original <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h/#l02450">2450</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h">ScalarEvolution.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
